full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
* English: NPP-Financial Risk Assessment Services for the Critical Minerals Infrastructure Fund program
* French: Services d'évaluation des risques financiers pour le programme du Fonds des infrastructures minérales critiques

## Tender Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-641-26134738
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000078328

## Notice Information
* Publication Date: January 31, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 15, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (EST)
* Amendment Date: February 15, 2024

## Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Contract Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Service (SRV)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Services/Work
The Department of Natural Resources is seeking a contract for Financial Risk Assessment Services to support the Critical Minerals Infrastructure Fund program. The services include evaluating the financial risks of the program and providing recommendations to the department.

## Evaluation Criteria
* Technical Merit (Score: 0-100%)
* Price (Score: 0-100%)
* Combined Rating (Score: 0-100%)

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* And many more...

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
* Canada

## Contracting Entity
* Name: Natural Resources Canada
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4

## Contact Information
* Name: Steve Verner
* Email: [steve.verner@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:steve.verner@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 543-6090

## Tender Documents
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30934/npp-nrcan-5000078382.pdf
